text: Va agar Alloh ʙixohad, mardumro ʙa saʙaʙi korhoi ʙade, ki kardaand, favran ʙozxost kunad, ʙar ruji zamin hec cunʙandae ʙoqi naguzorad va lekin Alloh ʙo lutfu karami Xud cazoi onhoro to zamone muajjan (ruzi qijomat) ʙa ta'xir meandozad va cun muddatason tamom sud, alʙatta, Alloh ʙa a'moli ʙandagoni xes ogoh ast va az guftoru kirdor va pindori onho ʙoxaʙar ast, az in ru, cunon ki sazovor ast, podosi a'molasonro medihad
